item.title: Lauren add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "Arthur felt happy. He was terribly pleased that the day was for once working out so much according to plan. Only twenty minutes ago he had decided he would go mad, and now here he was already chasing a Chesterfield sofa across the fields of prehistoric Earth." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Lauren add a quote by Lauren Willig
item.description: "It was the usual sort of academic battle: footnotes at ten paces, bolstered by snide articles in academic journals and lots of sniping about methodology, a thrust and parry of source and countersource. My sources had to be better." -- Lauren Willig
